PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-03641998-03-120,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
PrecisOrder fixing the dates upon which certain provisions of An Act to amend the Copyright Act, being chapter 24 of the Statutes of Canada, 1997 [BILL C-32], shall COME INTO FORCE, as follows: . 1. THURSDAY, MARCH 12, 1998 -- section 58.1, 2. WEDNESDAY, JULY 1, 1998 -- subsection 10(1), 3. FRIDAY, JANUARY 1, 1999 -- sections 7 and 54.1 and sections 29.6, 29.7 and 29.9 of the Copyright Act as enacted by subsection 18(1) of the Act. .
RegistrationRegistration: SI / 1998-0045 Publication Date: 1998-04-01
